item.title: PCB Slip Ring Project
item.description: About the Project We will be creating a pcb slip ring that lights up 2 LED lights with a USB C Connector! Slip rings are devices that allow electrical contacts through rotating bodies. ![[slipring.gif|350]] ![[cadslipring.gif]] Usually you would buy things like this, so the question remains, why reinvent the slip ring if it already exists? My excuse was that they're expensive. Over 200$ if you need one with a through hole in the center :(
